string.value: You're getting close to collecting the 12 Memory Fragments Cassandra mentioned, but you're not quite there yet. Let's go back to #bCassandra#k.
What the...She was talking as if she were going to give you an Aran Memory Fragment but...Hmpf, it's annoying, yes, but what else can you do? Let's talk to Cassandra and see what she has to say.
You're close to collecting all 12 Aran Memory Fragments. But what are these...?
Have you finished collecting the Aran Memory Fragments? You're probably a bit short.\r\n#b#L0#You're right. I haven't collected all 12 yet.#l\n#k
You seem to have forgotten all about the Arans... \r\n#b#L0#What are you talking about? I didn't forget about them!#l\n#k

Okay, okay. Then tell me this. What is the name of the girl who is waiting for the heroes to break out of the seal?
#b#L0#Jane#l
#L1#Kong Ji#l
#L2#Lilin#l
#k
You're right! The girl who waits for the heroes in Rien is Lilin. You haven't forgotten.
Are you going to have a party or something?
Are you going to just sit there and do nothing?

Perhaps the girl's earnest belief has brought the Arans back to life. By the way, #h0#... You said you were after the Aran Memory Fragments, correct? But you can't always get what you want. Wouldn't you agree?
